entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.StringAssert("{","x") throws System.FormatException #25373
  • Single EXE build takes minutes to launch, self contained build launches in seconds #25371
  • Implement the MSBuild Server Client Library as the default build driver #25365
    7.0.1xx
  • NET1136 errors in net6.0 project after updating to 6.0.300. #25363
  • Running dotnet/performance benchmark script with arm architecture fails for preview4. #25362
  • NetCore why not use bin or lib directory DLL files by default #25351
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MakeFieldReadonly.MakeFieldReadonlyDiagnosticAnalyzer cannot be created starting version 6.0.300 #25345

Closed

  • SDK should add NETStandard.Library v2.x reference instead of the NETStandard.Library v1.6.1 #24799
  • AnsiConsole should support NO_COLOR #25264
    7.0.1xx
  • Workload pack version is truncated if target platform major or minor version end in 0 #25370
  • Warning NETSDK1179 is always raised #25366

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta
  • Always detect if SelfContained was specified by the user #25367
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1765805 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Use System.Environment to obtain user HOME dir #25117
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for opting out of ANSI coloring via NO_COLOR env. variable #25273
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25340
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #25329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #25330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Marcpop msft upgraderuntime605 #25333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25336
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a helper script for identifying the SDK release containing a SHA #25337
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
